page.title: 14THE VILLAGE SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is a{Church of England} (Controlled) Primary School. It is quite small, having only{three {classrooms.}It was built just over{a {hundred years}ago and the infant classroom was added in 1974. At present there are{eighty-eight {children}in school, their ages ranging from{four}to{eleven.}We have a{ {headmaster,}who teaches for part of the week, two full-time{teachers}and a part-time{supply teacher.}During the week two other teachers visit, to teach{P.E.}and{Games,}and{trumpet}and{ {cornet. } Other workers include five{dinner {ladies,}a{school asisstant}and a {cleaner.}Because our school is quite small the dinners are cooked at another school, about eight miles away. They cost{60p}for infants and{ {63p}for juniors.
